targets.query: SELECT mean("free") AS "Free" FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Instance$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("pointsWrittenFail"), 1s) FROM "influxdb_httpd" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("pointsWrittenOK"), 1s) FROM "influxdb_httpd" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("numMeasurements") FROM "influxdb_database" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("numSeries") FROM "influxdb_database" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("diskBytes") AS "diskBytes", mean("memBytes") AS "memBytes", mean("cachedBytes") AS "cachedBytes" FROM "influxdb_tsm1_cache" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT moving_average(mean("HeapInUse"), 10) AS "heap active", moving_average(mean("HeapIdle"), 10) AS "heap idle" FROM "influxdb_runtime" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("queryReq"), 1s) FROM "influxdb_httpd" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "influxdb_measurement" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("clientError"), 1s) FROM "influxdb_httpd" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("serverError"), 1s) FROM "influxdb_httpd" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT (last("write_time") / last("writes")) AS "Write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "name" =~ /^*[0-9]$/ AND ("host" =~ /^$Instance$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name"
SELECT (last("read_time") / last("reads")) AS "Write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "name" =~ /^*[0-9]$/ AND ("host" =~ /^$Instance$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "name"

list.name: Instance
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES ON telegraf_internal WITH KEY = "host"
